Reviews.Title: It works for me
Reviews.Author: Mimsy
Reviews.Content: This is not a high end machine,so if you're looking for super speed and bells and whistles, you may want to pay more and get something better.. It works fine for my needs - I'm not into games. This is a second computer for me; I normally work on a MAC. I upgraded my old Dell laptop because I occasionally need to use apps that are not available for MAC. I had some initial problems, which I think I caused myself by changing a setting. Unfortunately, I couldn't figure out what I'd done. I tried MS help - which is close to impossible to find on their website. No help there.Eventually got it sorted out myself by using a utility that restores original settings..since then, it's worked fine.The display is nice. I don't find the computer to be particularly slow. Battery charged quickly , but I haven't had a chance to check the battery life. My biggest complaint is the way the Start menu is configured so you have to deal with it before getting to work on the desktop when you boot the machine. Also,lots of what amounts to advertising apps - but they are easy enough to get rid of. Some other minor irritations having to do w/Windows, but it sure beats the VISTA system that was on my old laptop. As I get used to it, I'm liking it better. This laptop does have a built-in DVD player. All in all, a pretty nice basic machine for home office, school work and routine stuff. Good luck if you need tech support.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Lauren Franklin
Reviews.Content: computer works really well!  Thank you Amazon for having this computer available and at a reasonable price.  keep up the good work

Reviews.Title: Slower than hoped for
Reviews.Author: Nancy H.
Reviews.Content: This product is used by 13 year old son and in addition to the difficulty of using the new operating system platform of Windows 8, the machine's performance was slower than anticipated.  He is beginning to get used to the new platform however he has had it crash once already, in less than a month, and had to initiate the machine as if it were directly out of the box.  This was evidently caused by a software glitch and fortunately he doesn't have a lot of saved information - it was just very inconvenient to have to go back through and set up mail and programs all over again.

Reviews.Title: Alright
Reviews.Author: Colby Troxell
Reviews.Content: Its an ok product. The back popped out under its own when I picked it up with one hand. And I hate windows 8 so I am not really pleased with anything right now

Reviews.Title: perfect
Reviews.Author: rygard ntemena
Reviews.Content: the laptop arrived in time and was perfectly packaged ,nothing was missing, I recommend it for people who want to use for work, studies, entertainment but not when it comes to video games...its useless when it comes to that.

Reviews.Title: Great for checking email...
Reviews.Author: bobby kear
Reviews.Content: Recieved this Laptop and here are the issues I had with it:1.This system has a Windows 8 OEM OS that is locked down, If you try to install any other OS it will crash. (This system will not support Linux at all and will BSOD when trying to install another version of Windows)2. System has a very slow processor that also shares graphics, thus newer versions of Photoshop that has performance based off GPU will see lag issues inside Photoshop when working on large scale pieces.3.The system processes uploaded video slowly, I can turn on the same video on my XPS laptop from Netflix with no lag, Turn on the same clip with this machine and you can see alot of issues with the processing.4.The system hangs at P.O,S,T ( Power on self test ) for long periods of time and sometimes you have to reboot multiple times for it to hand off to the Boot Process.All in all if your going to use this to check email or Facebook then this will work fine but for anything else then I wouldnt recommend it.

Reviews.Title: great computer
Reviews.Author: dano "dano"
Reviews.Content: Not happy with windows 8.  But the computer is great for the price.  The key board is difficult to get used to as the number key pad off sets everything to the left.  The featureless keys make alighning fingers awkward.  It will take time for this old dog to learn these tricks.

Reviews.Title: Just plain bad!
Reviews.Author: A.H.
Reviews.Content: I bought this in September 2013 for the upcoming school year.  The second day out of the box I needed a new charger.  The following March it crashed dumped all my software, Google Chrome, Norton Security etc.  I finally get around to re-installing everything and I can't get to the last step to activate my security because the WiFi won't activate.  It will say Airplane Mode is on/off but won't really do anything.  I should not have to be an IT specialist to work a basic laptop!

Reviews.Title: windows8
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Liked everything xcept, windows8.  The touch pad is too sensive for me, buying optical mouse.  Very good machine otherwise.  My lack of experience on a touchpad , makes it difficult.  Hopefully a optical mouse will help.

Reviews.Title: Pure Junk
Reviews.Author: Disenchanted
Reviews.Content: Toshiba low-end laptops are pure garbage. Flimsy, cheap, unreliable, and built with the cheapest components available. Save your money and spend a bit more on something else not built by Toshiba. Best case scenario, you might get 6-12 months out of your laptop before things start to fail. Worse case scenario (as I've just experienced), your laptop will last a matter of weeks before the lights go out. And unfortunately for the buyer, Toshiba often refuses to meet their own warranty obligations. Considering how cheap the laptops are, they don't want to help you, or fix the laptop. They would lose money otherwise. So if you send it in for repairs, like they'll inevitably recommend, you'll find yourself being asked to pay elaborate sums of money because the 'scope of work' is not within the boundaries of the original warranty agreement. This of course is not true. Toshiba is simply trying to force the added costs of warranty repairs down the throats of uninformed customers. Their laptops are cheap, but they won't actually save you any money in the long run.Save your money. Don't buy Toshiba. Consider any laptops made by Toshiba as being purely disposable, or built for third word countries with no consumer protection laws.

Reviews.Title: Problems with screen going red
Reviews.Author: Catherine Owenby
Reviews.Content: Although the laptop appeared to be in new condition it has continually had problems with the screen switching to red.  I bought this for my granddaughter and her mother says she will take it to have it repaired.  Unfortunately this is an added expense.  I would prefer having the laptop returned but that's up to my daughter.  Very disappointed that this item wasn't in perfect condition.

Reviews.Title: EXCELLENT
Reviews.Author: Ciro
Reviews.Content: I'm too happy with the product really is too good, it's fast and easy to handle.Persons in charge of the shop are very responsible and caring.The truth is I am very happy with the results.The computer is excellent.

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: Carmen Alvarez Alvarez
Reviews.Content: excelent product Im so happy with my new laptop Is faster and just what I expect. .I can say is good choise.

Reviews.Title: NOT GOOD
Reviews.Author: ronald wisner
Reviews.Content: THE LAPTOP HAS HAD TO GO BACK TO TOSHIBA BECAUSE THE WINDOWS OPERATING PROGRAM CRASHED. GOOD THING THAT I HAD NO IMPORTANT PROGRAMS ON IT YET.

Reviews.Title: the worst decision
Reviews.Author: Liliana Camargo
Reviews.Content: this laptop is extremely slow, even to type the letters. Do not represent a useful tool. Windows 8 is so confusing that it has been hard to install any new software. The memory shows that is at 50% when I barely have use it, and it has been less than a month since I got it. I wish I never had bought it!

Reviews.Title: good pc at low cost
Reviews.Author: Eduardo
Reviews.Content: Good product, good performance for a normal use I mean, surf internet, check email, Facebook and this like that, HDMI helps to see movies on your tv in HD or pictures If u want, the materials of construction like the Mouse buttons feel some cheap but generally is a great pc at low cost

Reviews.Title: Return of Laptop To Tech Cell Co.
Reviews.Author: H. Gilbert
Reviews.Content: I found 5 things wrong with the laptop and, after some back & forth e-mails, I got permission to return it to Tech Cell Co.You probably have copies of the mail in your files.Tech Cell and I disagreed on some of the things I listed as wrong. My professional technician agreed with me that what I had said was wrong , was actually wrong.I shilpped the unit back to Tech Cell. They were to receive it March 6 & have their tech check it out. If the unit was found wanting then I would get a full refund. Otherwise, they would charge a restocking fee and refund the rest.It is entirely the word of their tech. I can only hope I get an honest review that is not colored by his working for Tech Cell.H. Gilbert
